title: this is getting annoying :/
body: my game keeps crashing randomly in champ select i'm serious this is getting annoying and i'm getting penalties for no reason I don't leave games, client crashes in champ select and i get penalties but that's not the worse part. this is happening in ranked and i'm losing massive LP please fix this it's actually getting on my nerves {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body: Yesterday after the countdown in champ select reached zero it froze, I restarted the client and when I loaded up I asked in all chat whether this happened to anyone else and it did for the entire game. And right now I tried joining a game and in the middle of the loading screen it kicked me out with the message "Your have disconnected check your internet connection". What is going on?

This can happen if you have any third party programs like play.tv running, and can ending interacting poorly with a client.  I would remove any you have running, but if that's not the case for you give me some more details.  Are there any error messages?  When exactly is it happening?  Let me know and we can work on figuring this out!

Plays.tv is running in the back and i'm pretty sure its causing my game to crash since whenever i load up my PC i always exit out of everything i don't need to use but for some reason plays.tv never shuts down so i half to ctrl+alt+delete just to end task thank you and please respond if you want me to delete this thread {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
